Suite.Title: Facebook Ads

JsonPath.Title: Account Id
JsonPath.HelpText: ID of ad account

JsonPath.Title: Name
JsonPath.HelpText: The name of the ad account

JsonPath.Title: Balance
JsonPath.HelpText: Bill amount due

Compute.Title: Category

JsonPath.Title: Campaign Id
JsonPath.HelpText: Campaign's ID

JsonPath.Title: Name
JsonPath.HelpText: Campaign's name

JsonPath.Title: Status
JsonPath.HelpText: The effective status of this campaign.

JsonPath.Title: Created
JsonPath.HelpText: Created Time

JsonPath.Title: Adset Id
JsonPath.HelpText: Ad set ID

JsonPath.Title: Name
JsonPath.HelpText: Name of ad set

JsonPath.Title: Status
JsonPath.HelpText: The effective status of the ad set, which can be either its own status or caused by its parent campaign.

JsonPath.Title: Daily Budget
JsonPath.HelpText: The daily budget of the set defined in your account currency

JsonPath.Title: Budget
JsonPath.HelpText: The lifetime budget of the set defined in your account currency.

JsonPath.Title: Budget Remaining
JsonPath.HelpText: Remaining budget

JsonPath.Title: Billing Event
JsonPath.HelpText: The billing event that this adset is using

JsonPath.Title: Created
JsonPath.HelpText: Created time

JsonPath.Title: End Time
JsonPath.HelpText: End time

JsonPath.Title: Ad Id
JsonPath.HelpText: The ID of this ad.

JsonPath.Title: Name
JsonPath.HelpText: Name of the ad.

JsonPath.Title: Created
JsonPath.HelpText: Created time

JsonPath.Title: Status
JsonPath.HelpText: The effective status of the ad.

JsonPath.Title: Adset Id
JsonPath.HelpText: The ID of the ad set

JsonPath.Title: Campaign Id
JsonPath.HelpText: ID of the ad campaign that contains this ad

JsonPath.Title: Date Start
JsonPath.HelpText: The start date for your data.

JsonPath.Title: Date Stop
JsonPath.HelpText: The end date for your data.

JsonPath.Title: Campaign Id
JsonPath.HelpText: The unique ID number of the ad campaign

JsonPath.Title: Campaign Name
JsonPath.HelpText: The name of the ad campaign

JsonPath.Title: Adset Id
JsonPath.HelpText: The unique ID of the ad set

JsonPath.Title: Adset Name
JsonPath.HelpText: The name of the ad set

JsonPath.Title: Ad Id
JsonPath.HelpText: The unique ID of the ad

JsonPath.Title: Ad Name
JsonPath.HelpText: The unique ID of the ad

JsonPath.Title: Impressions
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times your ads were viewed.

JsonPath.Title: Reach
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your ads at least once.

JsonPath.Title: Spent
JsonPath.HelpText: The total amount of money you've spent on your campaign

JsonPath.Title: Clicks
JsonPath.HelpText: The total number of clicks on your ad. This may include offsite clicks to your website, Page likes, post comments, event responses or app installs.

JsonPath.Title: Social Impressions
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of clicks on links to an app store in your ads.

JsonPath.Title: Social Reach
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your ad when displayed with social information, which shows other Facebook friends who engaged with your Facebook Page or ad.

JsonPath.Title: Social Spent
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your ad when displayed with social information, which shows other Facebook friends who engaged with your Facebook Page or ad.

JsonPath.Title: Social Clicks
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of any clicks your ad receives (ex: likes, event responses, offsite clicks) when it's shown with social information

JsonPath.Title: Actions
JsonPath.HelpText: The total number of actions people took that are attributed to your ads. Actions may include engagement, clicks or conversions.

JsonPath.Title: Actions Value
JsonPath.HelpText: The total value of all conversions attributed to your ads.

JsonPath.Title: Cost per Action
JsonPath.HelpText: The average cost of a relevant action.

JsonPath.Title: CPC
JsonPath.HelpText: The average cost for each click (all) attributed to your ads.

JsonPath.Title: Frequency
JsonPath.HelpText: The average number of times each person saw your ads.

JsonPath.Title: Date Start
JsonPath.HelpText: The start date for your data.

JsonPath.Title: Date Stop
JsonPath.HelpText: The end date for your data.

JsonPath.HelpText: The unique ID number of the ad campaign

Text.Title: Filter by Id (Campaign, Adset, or Ad)

JsonPath.Title: Date Start
JsonPath.HelpText: The start date for your data.

JsonPath.Title: Date Stop
JsonPath.HelpText: The end date for your data.

JsonPath.Title: Frequency
JsonPath.HelpText: How often a given person in your target audience has seen your content.

JsonPath.Title: Reach
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your ads at least once. Reach is different from impressions, which may include multiple views of your ads by the same people.

Text.Title: Filter by Id (Campaign, Adset, or Ad)
